name: An Odd Stairwell Experience (GONE WRONG??!!??!?!?)
description:
Title: An Odd Stairwell Experience (GONE WRONG??!!??!?!?)

Platform: HTML 

Genre:  Text Adventure

Rating: E10+ 

Target Market: Ages 10+, casual gamers, appreciators of odd things

Game Overview: Journey into odd happenings in a stairwell. Your character finds themselves in an ODD stairwell. Strange things occur here, but you just want to get out.

Instructions: Click the options when your are prompted too during the HTML game

Game Design Team

Kristian Aviles – Game Designer
